description:
The Triton Cyprus poker tournament is scheduled to take place on April 2 through April 7, 2022 at the Merit Crystal Cove Resort and Casino in the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus.

This market asks whether Jason Koon will place 1st in at least one event in the 2022 Triton Cyprus poker tournament.

If Jason Koon places 1st in at least one event in the 2022 Triton Cyprus poker tournament, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Jason Koon does not compete in any events in the upcoming 2022 Triton Cyprus poker tournament, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be livestreams of the events and official information from Triton Series (https://triton-series.com/triton-poker-cyprus-special-edition/), however other credible reporting may be used.
